column3: str
Once the soul energy within your relic is attuned, present it to me. I shall remove its coating of soulglaze, that its newfound power might be unleashed.
What would you like enhanced?
<Sheet(Item,IntegerParameter(1),9)/>.
Nothing.
Have <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> enhanced?
Yes
No
Well? I cannot begin unless you lend me your weapon.
Please ensure that the relic you wish to enhance is placed in your Armoury Chest or inventory before speaking with Jalzahn.
Hm, this relic does not appear to be soulglazed. If you wish to enhance it, just say the word, and I shall see the deed done.

If you wish to have <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/> soulglazed, speak with Jalzahn while equipped with the weapon, then select <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Relic Weapon Novus Soulglazing<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
Hm, I am afraid it is too early to remove the soulglaze. You have some ways to go before the soul energy within the relic is fully attuned.
By using the Zodiac glass, it is possible to visually verify attunement progress.
Once your relic weapon novus has achieved full soul attunement, you may present it to Jalzahn to have it upgraded to a relic weapon nexus.
If you misplace your Zodiac glass, you may obtain a replacement by speaking with Drake.
We have already succeeded in enhancing this particular relic, have we not? You have no need for another, my friend.
You already possess <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/>.
I cannot well perform my work until you make room among your mess of possessions.
Ah, yes, the telltale humming of power yearning to be set free. I scarcely require a Zodiac glass to see that your weapon's soul energy is now fully attuned.
The soulglaze coating has served its purpose. The time is ripe for it to come off. This will take but a moment.
...It is done! Your weapon has awakened to its latent potential! Take it up once more, and feel its newfound power course through you!
